General.Name: GWB Immobilien AG
General.Description: GWB Immobilien AG engages in the planning, development, construction, rental, sale, and management of shopping and specialty retail centers primarily in medium-sized towns and suburban areas of Germany. The company's projects include shopping centers, specialty retail centers, self-service department stores, supermarkets, city-centre facilities, office buildings, and health and rehabilitation centers. Its operations comprise market research and location analysis; revitalization, consulting, project management, and marketing; building and concept planning; and facility management, such as commercial and technical infrastructure. The company, formerly known as GEG Gesellschaft für die Entwicklung von Discount- und Fachmarkten mbH & Co. KG, was founded in 1992 and is based in Siek, Germany. As of July 3, 2012, GWB Immobilien AG is in liquidation.
